mdRecord.dcterms:title: A Christmas Parade - Marshalls
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A photograph of the Christmas Parade marshals in a convertible car as they pass the Pix Theater (no longer standing). Take December 1965. The gentleman in the back seat nearest is Vernon T. Harris
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Christmas
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
